description: Cardiff Rugby have signed Bath Rugby's Louie Hennessey on a short-term loan.
title: Cardiff Rugby sign Bath's Louie Hennessey on short-term loan deal
title_page: Cardiff Rugby sign Bath's Louie Hennessey on short-term loan deal - BBC Sport
maintext:
Cardiff Rugby have signed Bath Rugby's Louie Hennessey on a short-term loan.
The 20-year-old centre, who originally came through the club's pathway, will provide cover with several players out injured.
Mason Grady, Harri Millard and Theo Cabango are all currently sidelined for the Welsh region.
Hennessey joined Bath's senior academy in 2022, having progressed through the Cardiff Schools and Cardiff Rugby system while studying at Hartpury College.
He recently signed a long-term contract extension with Bath, but will now provide temporary cover for Cardiff over the festive period.
